entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
